meanings.sent1: The kindergartners played together during recess.
meanings.sent2: The kindergartners learned their ABCs in school.
meanings.sent3: The kindergartners giggled when the teacher made a funny face.
meanings.sent4: The kindergartners were like little sponges, soaking up new knowledge every day.
meanings.sent5: The kindergartners' laughter filled the classroom with joy.

meanings.sent1: Two kindergartners shared a crayon to color together.
meanings.sent2: The kindergartners lined up to go to the playground.
meanings.sent3: The kindergartners' backpacks looked like a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent4: The kindergartners' curiosity was as bright as the sun.
meanings.sent5: The kindergartners' energy was contagious, spreading smiles to everyone around.
